segments.text: Don ’ t be angry with them . After all , they are still children .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I am still worry about them . I ’ m afraid ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I were you , I would not put crime in their doing these thing . We should encourage our children to do what they like , so long as they are not far off track .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I won ’ t put a crime into their doings .
segments.speaker: S2
